meanings.definition: A drug used to treat certain types of cancer.
meanings.sent1: The doctor prescribed mercaptopurine to help fight the cancer cells.
meanings.sent2: Patients often take mercaptopurine to combat cancer.
meanings.sent3: When the cancer saw mercaptopurine coming, it ran away!
meanings.sent4: Mercaptopurine is like a brave soldier battling the cancer enemy.
meanings.sent5: The power of mercaptopurine against cancer is truly remarkable.

meanings.definition: A medication that suppresses the immune system.
meanings.sent1: Mercaptopurine can weaken the immune system to prevent rejection of transplanted organs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors sometimes use mercaptopurine to lower immune responses.
meanings.sent3: The immune system felt a bit lazy after taking mercaptopurine.
meanings.sent4: Taking mercaptopurine is like putting a shield around the immune system.
meanings.sent5: The effect of mercaptopurine on the immune system is quite interesting.

meanings.sent1: Mercaptopurine is often included in chemotherapy regimens to fight cancer.
meanings.sent2: Chemotherapy sessions may involve the use of mercaptopurine.
meanings.sent3: The cancer cells were scared of the mercaptopurine chemotherapy!
meanings.sent4: Mercaptopurine works like a superhero fighting the villains of cancer.
meanings.sent5: The impact of mercaptopurine as a chemotherapy agent is significant.
